pullrequest.title: Use "ign sdf --check" to check sibling elements of the same type for non-unique names

content.raw:
Er, sorry: Just so I have it straight in my head, is `libsdformat-7` what we're ultimately going to target? \(to exapnd, `libsdformat-7 ==> OSRC Gazebo`, `libsdformat-8 ==> ignition-gazebo`\)

If so, can I ask why this is targeting `sdf6`?
content.html:
